verses.roman:
rādhikā hayena kṛṣṇera praṇaya-vikāra
svarūpa-śakti--'hlādinī' nāma yāṅhāra

synonyms: rādhikā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; hayena—is; kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; praṇaya-vikāra—transformation of love; svarūpa-śakti—personal energy; hlādinī—hlādinī; nāma—name; yāṅhāra—whose.
translation: Śrīmatī Rādhikā is the transformation of Kṛṣṇa's love. She is His internal energy called hlādinī.
